title: Oceanic Ranks
body: Why do people think that all OCE players aren't very good at league i play in OCE and i've beaten many Korean players in plat-challenger ( from dueling for fun). Personally i used to play on OCE but i play on Korea now.

replies.body: Also has to do that compared to the Millions of people that play in US there may be 100K good players where we have under 200-300K players and maybe 10-5K > Great players
I'd agree with this...in other words, only about 5% of the OCE server are any good at the game.
according to your op.gg u are bronze. I think all those wins were in your dreams also 1v1 dont mean shit

I mean he could just be a mechanical fighting god, but be garbage at csing, itemisation, taking objectives, teamfighting and such.

1v1 mechanics does not equal rank, it is only 1 of many factors that contribute to achieving a high rank.

Or the account he's using to post could just be a smurf he uses to mess around with bronze people.

We don't think *all* OCE players are complete and utter cr*p.

Just anyone who isn't in Master, Challenger or high Diamond.

I think it's safe to say that OCE has the *least* skilled players compared to other servers, that doesn't necessarily means they're just bad. No doubt it's due, in part, to the fact that E-Sports in the Oceanic region isn't all too popular, especially when compared to other regions, so the pros don't get as much support here as they would if they were, well, pretty much anywhere else.

Just look at all of Oceania's results over the past few years at international tournaments and you'll see why this is the case, simply put the best Korea/EU/NA/TW and even other wildcard players are plain better than ours.
